text: We will hear arguments next in 76-398, Citizens & Southern National Bank against Bougas.
Mr. Chief Justiceand may it please the Court.
Mr. Chief Justice Burger and may it please the Court, I am Mike Kovacich.

Are you suggesting that the person goes to another state of another jurisdiction from his own and uses their courts that that in and of itself draws him into the jurisdiction of that court for all other purposes.
No I would not Your Honor.
Nothing ambiguous about that statute, is it not?
No, Your Honor, I think that statute is fairly clear and I think that that situation -- .

No, but when you are talking about that situation, you are simply saying Georgia legislature has as a matter of policy declared that to be so, but we do not have that quite clear kind of expression here, do we?
No, we do not Your Honor and because of this courts decision in the Mercantile case that is holding that 12 USC Section 94 was mandatory.
